abstract: The name of the kernel routine.
overview:
## Discussion

The name of a kernel routine is the identifier used to declare it in the Core Image Kernel Language source code. For example, if you use the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIKernel/init(source:)] method to create a kernel from the source code below, the name of the returned [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIKernel] object is “moveUpTwoPixels”.
title: name
